name.name: Name
name.help: Please use only uppercase and lowercase letters and digits
name.description: Provide the unit name (we support this list https://github.com/hgrecco/pint/blob/master/pint/default_en.txt)

magnitude.name: Magnitude
magnitude.help: Please use only digits and decimals with no commas
magnitude.description: Provide a multiplier in case values are not in whole units
